009package Ch09_Automatic_Thresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.GlobalThresholder;
020import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.QuantileThresholder;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023/**
024 * <p>
025 * ImageJ plugin showing the use of the {@link QuantileThresholder} class.
026 * See Sec. 9.1 of [1] for additional details.
027 * </p>
028 * <p>
029 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>,
030 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
031 * </p>
032 * 
033 * @author WB
034 * @version 2022/04/02
035 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.global.QuantileThresholder
036 */
037public class Global_Quantile implements PlugInFilter {
038        
039        private static double quantile = 0.5;
040
041        /**
042         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
043         * is currently open.
044         */
045        public Global_Quantile() {
046                if (noCurrentImage()) {
047                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
048                }
049        }
050        
051        @Override
052        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
053                return DOES_8G;
054        }
055        
056        @Override
057        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
058                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) ip;
059                
060                quantile = IJ.getNumber("Black quantile [0,1]", quantile);
061                if (quantile < 0) quantile = 0;
062                if (quantile > 1) quantile = 1;
063                
064                GlobalThresholder thr = new QuantileThresholder(quantile);
065                int q = thr.getThreshold(bp);
066                if (q >= 0) {
067                        IJ.log("threshold = " + q);
068                        ip.threshold(q);
069                }
070                else {
071                        IJ.showMessage("no threshold found");
072                }
073        }
074}
